effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.

short_effect.sun_moon: Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This lowers their Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This lowers their Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This lowers their Speed stat.
